availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James D. Jones (Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer. Taylor County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Allen Jones. Father of David Jones, Holland Jones, Samuel Jones, Mary E. Jones, Bethany Jones, Emily Jane Jones, and James D. Jones. Farmer in Taylor County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Taylor County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Division 2, p. 128B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, p. 543.
"James D Jones, Sr (1810 - 1897)," Find A Grave, Memorial# 94407233, accessed February 24, 2017, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94407233.
